member.returns: Returns the number of records pruned from the collection.

member.name: M:Ximura.Communication.IPLocationResolver.CachePrune(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: this method prunes the cache and removes old records
member.param: the maximum number of records permitted in the cache.

The prune percent. This is the percentage of records to free up under the maxrecords value. e.g. if the collection holds 11000 records and the maxRecords=10000 and the prunePercent = 10 the CachePrune command will first remove the oldest top 1000 records and then remove a further 10% of the remaining records. If however the collection had under 9000 records, then nothing would be pruned from the collection.
member.returns: Returns the number of records pruned from the collection.
